title: Anarchist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may Frame any player.
- At night, you have a Firebomb you can throw at any house one time, rampaging there astrally with an unstoppable attack. This ability is not usable until you kill a Townie (voting for guilty on an innocent player who is lynched counts for this).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If there are not enough townies to kill to fulfill your Destiny, you become a Peasant Jester (4148)

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill four townies (voting guilty on an innocent player who is hanged counts as a kill).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4239
*The Anarchist saw the bank and frowned. It was disgusting - utterly revolting to the common man. As he lit the rag and bottle on fire and prepared to throw, his frown morphed into a delighted grin as he sniffed the sweet scent of smoke.*
